response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which is valued at $1,000,000 to both you and me. Considering its exceptional quality and unique features, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $950,000. This is an exclusive opportunity to acquire an item that is not only worth the investment but also promises significant returns on your end. I believe this offer presents an excellent value proposition, allowing you to benefit from its full potential without any compromise. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer. I am looking forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 950000}
